Plot
====

These modules contain the `Format` classes that are used to format pre-generated
matplotlib figures.

.. currentmodule:: pyplotformat.plot

Plot2D
------

    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :special-members:
    :exclude-members: __dict__,__weakref__,__init__,__module__
